_header: Here may men lere who lithes my steven / a feast…
Subjects: All Saints’, feast of; All Souls’ Day
_description: De omnibus sancti historia: the founding of the Feasts of All Hallows and All Souls, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: HEre mai men lere who lithes my steuynA fest of all halowes in heuyn…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Þat þai may haue help generallÞat has no speciall help to call
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 142-6.
